title: My Sejuani Painting!
body:
Hey everybody! Just wanted to share a Sejuani painting that I made a little while ago in my free time!

http://41.media.tumblr.com/f1e468360c3b6c81e79269b2038b4b97/tumblr_nmffvhLMlH1qk32lpo1_1280.jpg

THE COLD DOES NOT FORGIVE (ง •̀_•́)ง

I had a really great time painting the background especially. If you want to check out more of my work you can see it at either my [Patreon page](https://www.patreon.com/HYLIArt) or my [art blog!
](http://www.hyliart.tumblr.com)

I also run a [personal tumblr ](http://www.faeriefountain.tumblr.com) as well that I post a lot of wip art at.

(the original file size was like 14000 px wide, so this one was a pain to work on because it slowed photoshop to a crawl, which is why some parts are a little rough. Seriously it would take like 2 minutes to render a line and 15 minutes to save. Eventually I was just like WHATEVER IT'S **DONE)**

Hope you guys like it! Have an awesome day.

The fur is probably where its the most noticeable, and her armor is a bit weird too. Remember that golden color metals shade into a red tone
